english.segment1: There was darkness in my soul. Till I turned my heart toward you. Now I worship at your feet. As I boldly come to your throne. To bless your holy name
english.segment2: I was empty in my heart. Till you filled my with your power. Now I praise you more and more. Until on that day, with no more wait. We'll see you face to face
english.segment3: You have become my ray of light. When I knew my sun was fading. You are the source of all my soul. You're the pure fire penetrating. You have become my ray of light
english.segment4: There was blindness in my eyes. Till you touched me with your hand. Now a passion burns within. To be swept away in your embrace. Forever and a day
english.segment5: I lift up my heart to you. I lift up my hands to you. I give all my praise you you
english.segment6: I lift up my life to you. I lift up this song to you. I give all my praise to you.
